name: Venonat
flavorText:
Lives in the
shadows of tall
trees where it eats insects. It
is attracted by
light at night.

previous.name: Parasect
previous.flavorText:
A host-parasite
pair in which the
parasite mushroom has taken over the
host bug. Prefers
damp places.

next.name: Venomoth
next.flavorText:
The dustlike scales covering its wings
are color-coded to indicate the kinds of
poison it has.
